snippet: The mayor is using the shooting of a young Brooklyn boy to level baseless charges against critics of his unconstitutional policing tactics.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Mayor Michael Bloomberg for using the shooting death of 16-month-old boy in Brooklyn to level baseless charges against critics of his administration's unconstitutional policing tactics; contends that Bloomberg seems to be trying to make it harder for the next mayor to rebuild trust in communities scarred by racial profiling in the stop-and-frisk program.
lead_paragraph: The mayor is using the shooting of a young Brooklyn boy to level baseless charges against critics of his unconstitutional policing tactics.
